  • Method Details

    • readBusinessArchive

      public static BusinessArchive readBusinessArchive(InputStream inputStream) throws IOException, InvalidBusinessArchiveFormatException
      Create a business archive from an InputStream
      Parameters:
      inputStream -
      Returns:
      the business archived that was in the input stream
      Throws:
      IOException - in case of issue reading/writing on file system
      InvalidBusinessArchiveFormatException - if the input stream does not contains a valid business archive

    • readBusinessArchive

      public static BusinessArchive readBusinessArchive(File barOrFolder) throws InvalidBusinessArchiveFormatException, IOException
      Create a business archive from a valid file or folder
      Parameters:
      barOrFolder - the folder or file that contains the business archive to read
      Returns:
      the business archived that was in the file or folder
      Throws:
      IOException - in case of issue reading/writing on file system
      InvalidBusinessArchiveFormatException - if the input stream does not contains a valid business archive

    • writeBusinessArchiveToFolder

      public static void writeBusinessArchiveToFolder(BusinessArchive businessArchive, File folderPath) throws IOException
      Write the BusinessArchive to the folder given in parameter

      the written business archive the uncompressed version of writeBusinessArchiveToFile(BusinessArchive, File)

      Parameters:
      businessArchive - the BusinessArchive to write
      folderPath - the folder into the business archive must be written
      Throws:
      IOException

    • writeBusinessArchiveToFile

      public static void writeBusinessArchiveToFile(BusinessArchive businessArchive, File businessArchiveFile) throws IOException
      Write the BusinessArchive to the .bar file given in parameter.

      this file can then be read using readBusinessArchive(File)

      Parameters:
      businessArchive - the BusinessArchive to write
      businessArchiveFile - the folder into the business archive must be written
      Throws:
      IOException

    • businessArchiveFolderToFile

      public static String businessArchiveFolderToFile(File destFile, String folderPath) throws IOException
      Save the uncompressed business archive folder to a compressed file.

      this file can then be read using readBusinessArchive(File)

      Throws:
      IOException
